completion.item: <[!CDATA[Adds a focus changed listener on the controlParameters: FocusListener the - desired listener to be added to this controlThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not implementing the FocusListener interface ]]>
<[!CDATA[Tells wether the control has focus or notReturns: true for having the focus and false if not ]]>
<[!CDATA[Removes a focus listener from this controlParameters: FocusListener the - listener to remove from this controlThrows: TypeError - wether this is not a FocusListener ]]>
